name: Caterpillar Quest!
description:
This is Caterpillar Quest made for Ludum Dare 46!

In this fun little arcade game all you have to do is keep the Caterpillar alive!

Use A and D or the arrow keys to move the fan side to side. The fan pushes the Caterpillar in the sky. But if there is a hungry moth up there waiting to eat the caterpillar. Press the space key to turn off your fan! Then press it again to turn it back on!

  • Endless! - try to get the highest score.
  • Collect points - get points for surviving and get extra points for collecting food!
  • Fun pixel art style!

If you want to vote for my game and rate it that would be much appreciated! Any feedback is also appreciated!

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/caterpillar-quest

Made by:

  • Turtleflyte - code and art
  • Cocomendes - art and music
  • animitsu - art

Beware: I used two paid assets in the making of the game. Pro Camera 2D and Dotween Pro both from the Unity Asset store.
